title: 11 Best Post Lights That Look Elevated 2025
author: Blake Bakkila
excerpt: Create an exterior lighting moment with the best post lights. We rounded up our favorites from Rejuvenation, Lumens, Amazon, and more
text: All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.Whether they’re flanking walkways or illuminating corners of your driveway, the best post lights are functional additions to any exterior space. We’re always on the hunt for more style-forward lighting solutions—and despite an abundance of traditional silhouettes in the post light category, we discovered a few modern designs and playful shapes worth the front yard real estate. So if your aesthetic leans more modern-minimalist or you’re cultivating a cottagecore vibe, look no further than these fixtures to shed some light on your outdoor decor situation.The majority of post light models should fit a standard three-inch diameter post, but there are some with compatible posts from the same brand. There are even solar post lights! Before we dig in, just know that most manufacturers recommend professional installation because of all the wiring required. Below, the brightest ideas for your outdoor space from our favorite outdoor retailers, including Lumens, Pottery Barn, and Amazon.Our Top Picks for the Best Post LightsBest Updated Antique Feel: Pottery Barn Leander LED Outdoor Post Light, $609Best LED Option: dweLED Archetype LED Outdoor Post Light, $309 $263Best Modern Design: Visual Comfort Studio Freeport Lantern Head, $379 $340Best Industrial-Inspired: Hinkley Forge Outdoor Pier Mount, $299Best Budget-Friendly Pick: Sea Gull Lighting Globe Outdoor Post Lantern, $90 $67Pottery Barn Leander Metal LED Outdoor Post LightThere’s an antique bronze finish to this post light, making it one that could feel at home in a rustic cottage or modern farmhouse. The water glass finish emits a cozy, diffused glow that nods to the vintage aesthetic, while the angular shape is a distinctly contemporary touch.dweLED Archetype LED Outdoor Post LightThis LED-powered post-top light takes an energy-efficient approach to outdoor lighting with a sleek and modern design that’s perfect for minimal design aesthetics. Attach them to a simple matte black outdoor post and place them on either side of a concrete paved entryway as a warm way to great visitors.Visual Comfort Studio Freeport Lantern HeadEncased in a modern rectilinear form, this lantern head feels like an innovative spin on a timeless fixture. A tubular T10 bulb is recommended, which will also lean into the vintage aesthetic.Hinkley Forge Outdoor Pier MountHinkley started as a family-owned lantern company, and more than 100 years later they continue to craft unique fixtures to illuminate every area of your home. These pier mount lights have a bit of rustic appeal, taking notes from the original design of barn lights (plus, comes with a compatible post).Sea Gull Lighting Globe Outdoor Post LanternOne of the most cost-effective picks on our list is also a modernist’s dream. The oversized orb will make your home come aglow in a bold, sophisticated way and it’s a perfect pair to this coordinating post.Alcott Hill Boto Lantern HeadFor a candelabra effect, pair this hexagonal lantern head with a set of cohesive flame-shaped bulbs. A play option to accentuate Victorian architecture, it’s a traditional form with clean lines—a combo that’ll instantly create outdoor ambiance.The Great Outdoors Bay View Outdoor Post LightCoastal homes are the perfect properties to incorporate these weather-resistant, cylindrical lamp post lights with opal glass. If most of your time is spent outdoors, either hosting or enjoying the ocean views, we like the idea of creating a surrounded light scheme in your backyard with multiple posts.Designers Fountain Bayport Outdoor Post Lantern LightThe bell-like silhouette of this light fixture adds a charm, and customers love how it’s dark-sky-compliant, because light is only emitted downward. While it doesn’t look like the brand has a post to pair it with, Amazon shoppers frequently purchase this one with the John Timberland Hepworth Traditional Outdoor Light Post.Troy Lighting Lowry Outdoor Post LightIf you have a metal hardware theme going on in or outside your home, this post light with beveled edges, textured bronze, and patina brass can easily blend into your existing decor scheme. Clear glass surrounding the bulb is protective and provides a window to the central bulb.Rejuvenation Mariden Post MountTraditional decor aficionados, this one’s for you: Clear seeded glass is the highlight of this post mount, which is inspired by a classic lantern. Use it as a benchmark to illuminate the stone walkway leading to your front door and say goodbye to the days of navigating the dark with a phone flashlight.Fly Achilles Waterproof Solar Flower Post LightA low-profile option, these solar lights with a water-lily-inspired silhouette are surprisingly versatile for their whimsical shape. Use them to line your pool for the dreamiest midnight swims or even perch them atop of spacious ledge to create concentrated lighting moments throughout your backyard patio.
html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.

Whether they’re flanking walkways or illuminating corners of your driveway, the best post lights are functional additions to any exterior space. We’re always on the hunt for more style-forward lighting solutions—and despite an abundance of traditional silhouettes in the post light category, we discovered a few modern designs and playful shapes worth the front yard real estate. So if your aesthetic leans more modern-minimalist or you’re cultivating a cottagecore vibe, look no further than these fixtures to shed some light on your outdoor decor situation.

The majority of post light models should fit a standard three-inch diameter post, but there are some with compatible posts from the same brand. There are even solar post lights! Before we dig in, just know that most manufacturers recommend professional installation because of all the wiring required. Below, the brightest ideas for your outdoor space from our favorite outdoor retailers, including Lumens, Pottery Barn, and Amazon.

Our Top Picks for the Best Post Lights

  • Best Updated Antique Feel: Pottery Barn Leander LED Outdoor Post Light, $609Best LED Option: dweLED Archetype LED Outdoor Post Light, $309 $263
  • Best Modern Design: Visual Comfort Studio Freeport Lantern Head, $379 $340
  • Best Industrial-Inspired: Hinkley Forge Outdoor Pier Mount, $299
  • Best Budget-Friendly Pick: Sea Gull Lighting Globe Outdoor Post Lantern, $90 $67

Pottery Barn Leander Metal LED Outdoor Post Light

There’s an antique bronze finish to this post light, making it one that could feel at home in a rustic cottage or modern farmhouse. The water glass finish emits a cozy, diffused glow that nods to the vintage aesthetic, while the angular shape is a distinctly contemporary touch.

dweLED Archetype LED Outdoor Post Light

This LED-powered post-top light takes an energy-efficient approach to outdoor lighting with a sleek and modern design that’s perfect for minimal design aesthetics. Attach them to a simple matte black outdoor post and place them on either side of a concrete paved entryway as a warm way to great visitors.

Visual Comfort Studio Freeport Lantern Head

Encased in a modern rectilinear form, this lantern head feels like an innovative spin on a timeless fixture. A tubular T10 bulb is recommended, which will also lean into the vintage aesthetic.

Hinkley Forge Outdoor Pier Mount

Hinkley started as a family-owned lantern company, and more than 100 years later they continue to craft unique fixtures to illuminate every area of your home. These pier mount lights have a bit of rustic appeal, taking notes from the original design of barn lights (plus, comes with a compatible post).

Sea Gull Lighting Globe Outdoor Post Lantern

One of the most cost-effective picks on our list is also a modernist’s dream. The oversized orb will make your home come aglow in a bold, sophisticated way and it’s a perfect pair to this coordinating post.

Alcott Hill Boto Lantern Head

For a candelabra effect, pair this hexagonal lantern head with a set of cohesive flame-shaped bulbs. A play option to accentuate Victorian architecture, it’s a traditional form with clean lines—a combo that’ll instantly create outdoor ambiance.

The Great Outdoors Bay View Outdoor Post Light

Coastal homes are the perfect properties to incorporate these weather-resistant, cylindrical lamp post lights with opal glass. If most of your time is spent outdoors, either hosting or enjoying the ocean views, we like the idea of creating a surrounded light scheme in your backyard with multiple posts.

Designers Fountain Bayport Outdoor Post Lantern Light

The bell-like silhouette of this light fixture adds a charm, and customers love how it’s dark-sky-compliant, because light is only emitted downward. While it doesn’t look like the brand has a post to pair it with, Amazon shoppers frequently purchase this one with the John Timberland Hepworth Traditional Outdoor Light Post.

Troy Lighting Lowry Outdoor Post Light

If you have a metal hardware theme going on in or outside your home, this post light with beveled edges, textured bronze, and patina brass can easily blend into your existing decor scheme. Clear glass surrounding the bulb is protective and provides a window to the central bulb.

Rejuvenation Mariden Post Mount

Traditional decor aficionados, this one’s for you: Clear seeded glass is the highlight of this post mount, which is inspired by a classic lantern. Use it as a benchmark to illuminate the stone walkway leading to your front door and say goodbye to the days of navigating the dark with a phone flashlight.

Fly Achilles Waterproof Solar Flower Post Light

A low-profile option, these solar lights with a water-lily-inspired silhouette are surprisingly versatile for their whimsical shape. Use them to line your pool for the dreamiest midnight swims or even perch them atop of spacious ledge to create concentrated lighting moments throughout your backyard patio.
